ct_path0 = [3 254 51 50 253 4 160 244 33 21 114 64 335 161 339]; 
ct_path1 = [387 146 291 31 73 72 32 290 147 388 3]; %lowest energy boundaries, Ni
ct_path2 = [3 164 243 34 19 117 63 336 157 332];

stgb100 = [247 149 74 36 216 7 264 52 151 378 1 299 148 41 214 6 379 112 16 250 40 61 103 154 245 330];
stgb110 = [fliplr(ct_path0) 164 243 34 19 117 63 336 157 332];

ict_path1 = [4 384 143 309 284 28 66 69 25 287 140 381];
twist100 = [251 150 331 75 156 39 62 8 252 265 17 155 113 380 2 215 300 42];
ict_path2 = [4 386 145 286 30 68 71 27 289 142 383 5];
twist110 = [356 165 357 65 132];
stgb111_112 = [385 144 285 29 67 70 26 288 141 382 5];

%shield boundaries (ATGBs?)

sh1 = [240 109 353 54 85 259 364 268 224 292]; %ICT-CT-NB110
sh2 = [190 217 277 133 124 346 322 9 369 317 201 43 94 76 233 167 256 302]; %NB100-ICT-NB110

%id groups useful for plotting 
high_sym = union([ct_path0,ct_path1,ct_path2,ict_path1, twist110],[stgb111_112,twist100,ict_path2,stgb100]);
shields = union([stgb100,stgb110,ict_path1],[sh1 sh2]);
low_sym = setdiff(1:388,high_sym);

sigma3_bp_path = [3 261 366 80 178 45 13 11 47 371 78 177 258 5 383 142 289 27 71 68 30 286 145 386 4 116 163 18 337 333 20 159 119 3];
